title: Vicksburg National Military Park: Donations
body: Donations       Vicksburg National Military Park works closely with the Friends of Vicksburg National Military Park and Campaign to accept donations towards park projects and activities including historic tablet replacement and monument cleaning and preservation. For further information on how your contribution can help in preserving this significant resource, please check the Friends website at:   Friends of Vicksburg National Military Park and Campaign       Tablet Replacement Dedication - October 2008 NPS Photos        Lt. General John C. Pemberton Statue Preservation NPS Photos
